definition: not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°

sentences.english: But economic problems at home can also make people feel they have few other choices.
sentences.chinese: 但海内的经济问题也会使人们感到抉择余地未几。

sentences.english: The piece of cake I got was almost the largest.
sentences.chinese: 我获得的蛋糕差未几是最大的一块。

sentences.english: This book is nearly as thick as that one (is).
sentences.chinese: 这本书差未几与那本书一样厚。

sentences.english: The day was done, and the merrymakers had nearly all departed.
sentences.chinese: 一天已经过往，寻欢作乐的人们差未几全走光了。

sentences.english: Soon after, Zhang Zhen and nine thousand year old chat, that he is like a fisherman in Henan.
sentences.chinese: 未几，张珍与九千岁闲聊，谓他似河南一个渔夫。

sentences.english: How long do not fear of the scripture sound outside the ring.
sentences.chinese: 未几久战战兢兢的经文声在屋外响起。

sentences.english: The mast was nearly as long as the one room of the shack.
sentences.chinese: 桅杆跟这窝棚内的单间房子差未几普通长。

sentences.english: Zhang is one of the few actresses who are merely active in films;
sentences.chinese: 张静初是为数未几的几个，专注于影坛发展演员之一。

definition: to not have had time/to have not yet/not to touch upon
soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
